author: alejands
body:
#### PR description:

Migrate EcalMonitorPrescaler to `edm::global::EDFilter<edm::RunCache<...>>` as part of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404

The event counters used for prescaling are now stored in a `edm::RunCache<PrescaleCounter>`, where `PrescaleCounter` is a struct wrapper for an array of `std::atomic<unsigned>`

For more details on  `edm::global::EDFilter<edm::RunCache<...>>` (and future reference): https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/FWMultithreadedFrameworkGlobalModuleInterface#edm_RunCacheT

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles with no `CMS_DEPRECATED` warnings

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Migrate EcalMonitorPrescaler deprecated legacy EDFilter
